attributes.action: lower the amount for people on low income to pay the csa
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned would like the government to lower the amount of csa that people have to pay who are on low wages. We agree we have to pay money for our children but a fairer amount should apply so the parent who does not have the children can manage to live on the remainder of his/her wages.
